free: #e What happened to the rice last time you went to the farm?
#c 你去田裡看水稻怎麼樣了。
#e I haven’t checked yet.
#c 我還沒有去看。
#e I only picked the snap beans under the peach trees.
#c 只有去摘長豆，就在桃樹下。
#e Because of the frequent rain, probably the rice is not good. I think so.
#c 常常下雨的關係，可能稻子的果實不太好，我的想法。
#e What do you think after seeing the rice? That’s what I think.
#c 你看過稻子的想法如何，我的想法是這樣。
#e Well, what can I do? The weather is like this.
#c 是，有什麼辦法呢，既然是這樣的季節。
#n ma’an-en ku fana’「有什麼辦法」，sa-ma-ha’en-ma-ha’en「既然如此」。
#e This is how the weather changes. This is the only way.
#c 這就是氣候的變化，就是這樣的結果。
#e What I am going to say next is that probably the rice is going to mature.
#c 其次我要說的是，稻子好像快出來了。
#e Maybe in June.
#c 大概在六月。
#e It is time to harvest, I think.
#c 可能就要割稻了，我判斷。
#e We should arrange the stuff for harvest, like sacks.
#c 我們開始整理，作為收割時的用品，用一袋袋的麻袋。
#e Take them out, I think.
#c 拿出來曬穀場外面，我的想法。
#e Yeah, I think so, too.
#c 是，我也這麼想。
#e If we reap the rice, where should we dry it?
#c 如果我們割稻了呢，不知道去哪裡烘乾。
#e What if we store it at the farmers’ association?
#c 如果到農會呢？
#e How about drying it at Papoh’s house?
#c 如果到Papoh家去晒呢？
#e I am asking for your opinion.
#c 我要問問你的想法。
#e I think it doesn’t matter. Everywhere is the same to me.
#c 我的想法，無所謂，哪裡都是一樣的。
#e If you say so, okay.
#c 如果你說的這樣可以。
#e To sum up, wouldn’t it be better if (we do it) at the farmers’ association?
#c 把我們的話整理一下，我想在農會不是最好嗎？
#e We don’t have to carry them around, I think so.
#c 不用再扛來扛去的。
#e Therefore, I want to know your opinion.
#c 所以我想問問你的想法。
#e As for my rice, I won’t store it at the farmer’s association.
#c 我割稻後稻子不會送到農會。
#e I will leave my share at Kapiyas’ place.
#c 我要吃的寄放在Kapiyas那裡。
#e Well, that’s okay, if that’s what you think.
#c 是的，可以。如果你這樣想。
#e I don’t know how to change your mind.
#c 我不知道如何（改變）妳的心。
#e It’s okay that you leave your portion at Katay’s place.
#c 放Katay那也好。
#e That won’t be tiring when you (try to) get the food, if that’s what you think.
#c 去拿的時候，去拿家裡要吃的糧食就不會很辛苦，這樣，既然你的意思是這樣。
#n Katay跟上述提及的Kapiyas是同一個人。
#e The peaches that (we) grow....
#c 現在我們種的那些桃子，...。
#e Perhaps we didn’t take care of the peach trees we grew. There are weeds everywhere.
#c 可能我們種的那些桃樹我們倆很久沒有照顧，雜草叢生。
#e Did you go and take a look?
#c 你去看過了嗎？
#e I took a look at those two in the west.
#c 我看了西邊那二棵。
#e I saw that they were all red.
#c 我看整片都紅的。
#e They were all rotten; the rest were infested with worms.
#c 敲下一個爛一個，敲下一個爛一個，沒有不被蟲叮的。
#e I didn’t manage to deal with it.
#c 我就這樣放著不管。
#n pa-kinira-han有放任不處置的涵意。
#e We didn’t spray pesticides, so the worms grew.
#c 我們沒有噴藥，那樣子所以長蟲。
#e I went to Takuliaw yesterday to check.
#c 我昨天去takuliaw看過。
#e The peaches this year are not really good. So many worms.
#c 真的今年的桃子的果實不好，都長蟲。
#e Well, we didn’t spray pesticides, so his fruits are not good.
#c 那樣子，我們沒有噴藥，所以他的果實不好。
#e I picked some yesterday.
#c 我昨天有去採。
#e The good ones were less than ten.
#c 差不多不到十個好的。
#e Did you throw them away?
#c 你丟了嗎？
#e I didn’t bring them back here.
#c 我沒有拿回來。
#e (Let's see) later, when we go to carry the concrete.
#c 等一下看怎麼樣，我們要去運水泥時。
#e Right. Another thing that I want to mention is the grapes that we planted.
#c 是的，其次我要說的是那裡種的葡萄。
#e The grapes sprouted.
#c 長出來了，開花（這裡語誤），出芽了，那個葡萄。
#e I took a piece of black cloth to cover the plant.
#c 我帶了覆蓋山蘇的黑布幔。
#e We can do it this way. As a net, I think.
#c 可以把它舖上作為網子，我這樣想。
#e There is a net at home.
#c 可以的話，家裡有網子。
#e If Lekal didn’t take it, we’ll use it as a shed for the grapes. That’s what I think.
#c 如果lekal沒有拿去幹麻的話。把它拿來，我們作葡萄的棚子，我這樣想。
#e Didn’t Mayaw purchase a piece of land there at Kuo Chintien’s?
#c 另外，上次mayaw買了地在郭金田那，不是嗎?
#n IU191處發音人語誤講成mi-ala，其實應該是mi-‘aca購買才對。
#e Below Kasapad’s.
#c 在Kasapad他們的下面。
#e I have sent money to Kuo Chintien, half of it.
#c 我把錢寄給郭金田了，寄了一半。
#e A few days later when the title deed is done, I will pay the balance.
#c 過幾天等到處理完所有權狀後，我還要再拿錢過去。
#e We will probably come back then.
#c 可能我們那時候回來。
#e In which month are they coming back?
#c 她們大概是幾月回來？
#e This month.
#c 就是這個月。
#e This June?
#c 這個六月嗎？
#e Right, this June, or probably May.
#c 是，這個六月，或是五月。
#e So last time you mentioned that Mayaw already bought that piece of land.
#c 所以你那次提過的，Mayaw買了那塊地後，...。
#e We are going to spray pesticides. That is what you said.
#c 我們去噴藥，妳這樣說過。
#e When the weather is good, we’ll go there to spray pesticides. That’s what I think.
#c 看什麼時候天氣好，我們去噴藥，我是這樣子想。
#e If you do not have time, we will not force you. Your child will be angry.
#c 如果沒有時間不要勉強，妳的小孩會罵。
#e There is nothing to do. We will go there to spray pesticides.
#c 這時候有什麼事，沒有什麼要忙的啊，我想還是去噴藥好了。
